org.barghos.core.pool.color

Class HDRColor3Pool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.barghos.core.pool.color.HDRColor3Pool

  • public class HDRColor3Pool
extends java.lang.Object
    This pool contains instances of the type HDRColor3.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HDRColor3Pool() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HDRColor3 get()
      Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and resets it.
      static HDRColor3 get(double scalar)
      Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to scalar.
      static HDRColor3 get(float r, float g, float b)
      Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to r, g and b.
      static HDRColor3 get(int scalar)
      Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to scalar.
      static HDRColor3 get(int r, int g, int b)
      Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to r, g and b.
      static HDRColor3 get(ITup3R t)
      Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to the values of t.
      static void store(HDRColor3... instances)
      Stores HDRColor3 instances in the pool for late reuse.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HDRColor3Pool

        public HDRColor3Pool()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static HDRColor3 get()
        Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and resets it.
        Returns:
        A stored instance.

      • get

        public static HDRColor3 get(ITup3R t)
        Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to the values of t. the values of t are interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.
        Parameters:
        t - A tuple that contains the rgb values in unitspace.
        Returns:
        A stored instance.

      • get

        public static HDRColor3 get(double scalar)
        Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to scalar. scalar is interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits. It is not actually "scaling" the rgb values! It is just a value that the rgb values are set to.
        Parameters:
        scalar - A scalar in unitspace.
        Returns:
        A stored instance.

      • get

        public static HDRColor3 get(int scalar)
        Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to scalar. scalar is interpreted as in colorrange (0 - 255) but can exceed these limits. It is not actually "scaling" the rgb values! It is just a value that the rgb values are set to.
        Parameters:
        scalar - A scalar in colorrange.
        Returns:
        A stored instance.

      • get

        public static HDRColor3 get(float r,
                            float g,
                            float b)
        Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to r, g and b. r, g and b are interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.
        Parameters:
        r - The red component.
        g - The green component.
        b - The blue component.
        Returns:
        A stored instance.

      • get

        public static HDRColor3 get(int r,
                            int g,
                            int b)
        Returns an instance of HDRColor3 from the pool and sets its components to r, g and b. r, g and b are interpreted as in colorrange (0 - 255) but can exceed these limits.
        Parameters:
        r - The red component.
        g - The green component.
        b - The blue component.
        Returns:
        A stored instance.

      • store

        public static void store(HDRColor3... instances)
        Stores HDRColor3 instances in the pool for late reuse.
        Parameters:
        elements - The instances to store.
